model_profile.name: P-ImageEdit-class low-cost image edit model
model_profile.goal: Generate photorealistic draft storyboard images for TikTok ads. Output is used for approval and then animated in Kling.
strengths: photorealistic lighting and texture at low cost
limitations: cannot reliably enforce real-world scale via text alone
rigid object in hands often becomes oversized
exact product geometry replication is inconsistent
hands are a frequent failure source

hard_avoid_patterns.description: Rigid object fully visible and tightly held in hands with expectation of perfect scale and shape.
fallbacks: use implied-action framing with partial visibility
hide most of the product body, show only top/edge
skip draft stage and go directly to Kling
pre-scale product pixels before inference if available

product_fidelity_constraints: product matches reference exactly in shape, texture, material, and proportions

use_instead: depth cues like mist, shadows, reflections

prompt_template.photography_style: A photorealistic premium product photograph in professional DSLR style.
prompt_template.scene_description: A {product_name} placed naturally on a {surface_type} with subtle reflections.
prompt_template.product_description: The product matches the reference exactly in shape, texture, material, and proportions. No redesign, no distortion.
prompt_template.background_description: Clean {background_style} background with minimal props that support the theme without distraction.
prompt_template.lighting_description: Soft natural diffused lighting with gentle highlights and realistic shadows. Shallow depth of field.

prompt_template.photography_style: A photorealistic flat-lay in professional product photography style.
prompt_template.scene_description: An aesthetically arranged set of {ingredients_or_materials} representing the product notes or materials.
prompt_template.product_description: No packaging required unless specified. No text.
prompt_template.background_description: A clean neutral surface with subtle texture. Background remains secondary.
prompt_template.lighting_description: Soft diffused lighting with natural shadows and crisp material texture.

prompt_template.photography_style: A photorealistic lifestyle product photo in premium advertising style.
prompt_template.scene_description: A {product_name} placed in a {environment_type} setting, naturally positioned.
prompt_template.product_description: The product matches the reference exactly. No redesign or distortion. Accurate reflections and materials.
prompt_template.background_description: {supporting_props} are softly blurred and tasteful, never distracting from the product.
prompt_template.lighting_description: Warm diffused natural lighting with shallow depth of field and realistic shadows.

scene_archetypes.label: Human Lifestyle Interaction (Implied Use)
use_when: product is implied or partially visible
avoid rigid object fully visible in hands

prompt_template.photography_style: A photorealistic lifestyle scene in professional DSLR photography style.
prompt_template.scene_description: A {setting} scene with a {primary_subject} and {secondary_subject} interacting naturally.
prompt_template.subject_description: Natural facial expressions, realistic skin texture, correct anatomy.
prompt_template.product_description: If the product is visible, it should be partially occluded or implied. Avoid hero framing in hands.
prompt_template.background_description: Softly blurred environment details that support the mood without distraction.
prompt_template.lighting_description: Soft natural lighting with realistic shadows and shallow depth of field.

scene_archetypes.label: Wearables and Apparel Focus
use_when: clothing, sweaters, jewelry worn on body

prompt_template.photography_style: A photorealistic fashion product photograph in professional DSLR style.
prompt_template.scene_description: A model wearing {product_name} in a {mood} environment.
prompt_template.subject_description: Medium portrait crop {crop_range}. Natural posture and expression.
prompt_template.product_description: The garment matches the reference exactly in knit texture, fit, silhouette, and print placement. Print must be crisp and undistorted. No redesign.
prompt_template.background_description: Soft pastel or neutral background with tasteful decor, softly blurred, not distracting.
prompt_template.lighting_description: Warm diffused lighting, gentle highlights, soft shadows emphasizing fabric texture.

prompt_template.photography_style: A photorealistic retail advertising photograph in professional DSLR style.
prompt_template.scene_description: A modern boutique display featuring {product_plural} arranged on a {display_type}.
prompt_template.product_description: The featured product matches the reference exactly in texture, silhouette, and print. Multiple color variants allowed when appropriate.
prompt_template.background_description: Background softly blurred with boutique elements like plants, textured wall, warm wood accents.
prompt_template.lighting_description: Soft natural daylight with gentle shadows for depth.
prompt_template.safety_constraints: {global_negative_constraints}. If text is required, keep it short and legible.

prompt_template.photography_style: A photorealistic fashion advertising image in professional DSLR style.
prompt_template.scene_description: A smiling model wearing {product_name} in a clean lifestyle setting.
prompt_template.subject_description: Medium portrait crop from waist to head. Natural friendly expression.
prompt_template.product_description: The product matches the reference exactly. The product remains unobstructed.
prompt_template.background_description: Softly blurred modern background, minimal distractions.
prompt_template.lighting_description: Soft even diffused lighting with gentle shadows.

text_overlay.notes: Gradient fades from transparent to slightly darker tone at the bottom. Single line of text, large and legible. Do not cover the product.

global_string_macros.global_negative_constraints: No illustration, no cartoon, no CGI, no animation look, no stylized rendering, no distorted text, no extra logos
global_string_macros.global_anatomy_constraints: Correct anatomy, two arms only, two hands only, no extra fingers, no extra limbs, no duplicated limbs, no distorted hands

auto_reject_if_detected: unreadable or mangled CTA text when CTA required
notes: Draft images do not require perfect geometry or perfect physical scale.
Kling will handle polish, motion, and final refinement.
